info.title: Business Partner Events
info.description:
A business partner is an organization (company, subsidiary), person or group of people or organizations in which your company has a business interest. The following events are available for business partner:

* Business partner changed
* Business partner created

x-sap-shortText: Informs a remote system about created and changed business partners in an SAP S/4HANA Cloud tenant.

message.description: This event is raised when Business Partner is changed.
This event is raised when Business Partner is created.
